subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The Wildcats have amassed a 32-2 record, yet there are still some who wonder if this year’s team is just a polished-up version of last year’s.
snippet: The Wildcats have amassed a 32-2 record, yet there are still some who wonder if this year’s team is just a polished-up version of last year’s.
